info.institution: Katrina Avery, Computer Science Dept., Box 1910, Brown University, Providence, RI 02912
info.occupation: Nov 10 - We are sorry to report that Jak Kirman passed away recently. Jak received his PhD from Brown in 1994. He worked as a postdoc for Leslie Kaelbling and Tom Dean for the next year and a half and served the department as an instructor for the object-oriented section of CS04. Although Jak had been having some health problems, his death was sudden and unexpected
